entry.title: KXK DYNAMICS POLISHING RACK PR-2 (PATENT PENDING) MADE IN THE USA ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: KXK
Type: Tool
Price: 79.99

Introducing the KXK Dynamics PR-2, designed for maximum mobility and efficiency!  A year ago... at the dawn of 2017 KXK Dynamics changed the detailing world with the markets first polishing rack designed for storing and displaying the detailers tools of choice... their polishers!  Today on February 1st 2018 KXK Dynamics takes it a step further with the PR-2 or what we at Sky's the Limit have affectionately named the Onesie or Mini Rack!  Technically named the KXK Dynamics PR-2, this new unit easily mounts to the wall or even directly to your detail cart!  What's more, it is designed as an integrated shock absorber so that when placing the machine on the rack it does not fall off even if moving or bumped!  The rack absorbs shock and holds the machine fast as you continue other activities without pause.  Check out the videos tab for more information on this.

The KXK PR-2 can safely house up to 2 machines, one large in the front, and one mini unit in its cradle.  Fabricated from high strength steel, the PR-2 is precision cut, punched, and formed to exact specifications.  The PR-2 is then coated in a high strength matte powder coat finish, both inside and out, to provide an additional layer of protection from oxidation and offer an industrial aesthetically pleasing finish.  At an incredibly thrifty $54.99 EVERY enthusiast should own one of these and every professional detailer needs one on their cart!  Get yours today!

The PR-2 is proudly designed, fabricated, finished, and assembled in the USA by KXK Dynamics “By Detailers For Detailers”.

Features: 

  • Can be mounted onto a detail cart or wall!
  • Easily fits a variety of Dual Action, Pneumatic, and Rotary Buffers
  • Keeps your machines organized
  • Stores up to 2 machines
  • Durable and Rust-proof Finish
  • Neoprene Gasket for hanging area is included
  • Made in the USA: Design, fabrication, finish, and assembly 

Specifications: 

  • Material: 14 Gauge high strength steel
  • Finish: Industrial Strength Powder Coat
  • Width: 6”
  • Height: 9”
  • Depth from wall: 3"
  • Weight: 1.9 lbs +/-
  • Fastener Spacing: 3/4” o.c.
  • Storage Opening: 5” x 6” 

Mounting Hardware Not Included

entry.title: KXK DYNAMICS PALM BLOX SET (SOFT) ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: KXK
Type: Sanding
Price: 44.99

KXK DYNAMICS PALM BLOX SET (SOFT)

PALM BLOX SOFT Series are sanding blocks that were specifically designed for use on OEM paint. When used in combination with sand paper, PALM BLOX's ergonomic, patent-pending design, maximizes the contact between the sanding block and a vehicle panel to obtain a more consistent, even sanding mark that can be polished out quickly and easily! PALM BLOX's design also provides automotive refinishing technicians with enhanced feedback between the block and the panel being sanded.

PALM BLOX SOFT are offered in 3 different sizes:
3" x 3/4", 4" x 1", and 5 1/4" x 1 1/4"

• PBS-3 Block: 3" x .75" Soft Foam Black Block
• PBS-4 Block: 4" x 1" Soft Foam Black Block
• PBS-5 Block: 5.25" x 1.25" Soft Foam Black Block

entry.title: KXK DYNAMICS PALM BLOX SET (HARD) ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: KXK
Type: Sanding
Price: 44.99

PALM BLOX HARD Series are sanding blocks that were specifically designed for use on NON-OEM paint. When used in combination with sand paper, PALM BLOX's ergonomic, patent-pending design, maximizes the contact between the sanding block and a vehicle panel to obtain a more consistent, even sanding mark that can be polished out quickly and easily! PALM BLOX's design also provides automotive refinishing technicians with enhanced feedback between the block and the panel being sanded.

PALM BLOX HARD are offered in 3 different sizes:
3" x 3/4", 4" x 1", and 5 1/4" x 1 1/4"

• PBH-3 Block: 3" x .75" Hard Foam White Block
• PBH-4 Block: 4" x 1" Hard Foam White Block
• PBH-5 Block: 5 1/4" x 1.25" Hard Foam White Block

entry.title: KXK DYNAMICS PAD PUNCHER SET V2.0 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: KXK
Type: tool
Price: 319.99

KXK DYNAMICS PAD PUNCHER SET V2.0

Tired of spending hundreds or even thousands of dollars on polishing pads? Now YOU can punch out your very own 1 3/8", 2", and 2 3/4" pads in minutes from the comfort of your own shop! The XP Pad Punch Series furthers our #1 goal, which is to place the power solely into YOUR hands to increase the efficiency and profitability of YOUR business.

Our XP Pad Punch V2 now features shorter punches with the new interchangeable XP-S Stryker Handle! The Stryker Handle is the "lynchpin" within the XP Pad Punch V2. The XP-S Stryker Handle was designed to decrease the weight of each punch from our previous design, as well as to be interchangeable between all 3 punches. By shortening the height of each punch, and transferring the function to the XP-S Stryker Handle, you simply complete a few flicks of the wrist, and bingo the handle spins into place.

Set includes one of each: XP-1, XP-2, XP-3, XP-S Stryker, XP-0 Punch Board.

entry.title: KXK DYNAMICS RID STIX (4PCS) ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: KXK
Type: Sanding
Price: 26.99

The KXK Dynamics R.I.D.STIX advanced sanding blocks are designed to aid in the removal of random isolated deeper scratches that cannot be achieved by compounding and polishing alone. When used in combination with sand paper, R.I.D.STIX ergonomic, patent-pending design, maximizes the contact between the sanding block and a vehicle panel to obtain a more consistent, even sanding mark that can be polished out quickly and easily! Years of research and development by Jason Kilmer, Eron Knox of Red's Detail Co., and Andy Ward of Proficient X results in TWO unique sanding block styles both designed to provide unique, tactile, and sensitive feedback to the technician!

• 2 Hard Foam White Blocks
• 2 Soft Foam Black Blocks

• Contours To Surface
• Beveled Top
• No Bevel On Bottom
• Customizable
• Length: 2"
• Width: 1/2"
• Height: 3/4"
